remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含源自於與組態設定的靜態方法。The class contains static methods for interfacing with configuration settings. 方法可讓開發人員來設定遠端基礎結構，透過使用格式化的 XML 組態檔。The method allows developers to configure the remoting infrastructure through the use of XML formatted configuration files. 類別也包含數種方法可以用戶端和伺服器端註冊的用戶端和伺服器啟動物件，位於伺服器上。The class also contains several methods for client-end and server-end registration of client and server activated objects that reside on the server. 類別會提供一些可協助使用和發行遠端物件的方法。The class provides a number of methods to help in using and publishing remoted objects. 方法提供的功能來儲存啟動及通訊與遠端物件的執行個體中所需的所有相關資訊更新版本的序列化和傳輸至遠端位置的類別。The method provides the functionality for storing all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object in an instance of the class for later serialization and transmission to a remote location. 方法會回復此程序，建立可由應用程式，而不必考慮任何遠端細分的遠端物件 proxy。The method reverses this process, creating a proxy for a remote object that can be used by an application without regard for any remoting subdivisions. 類別包含啟動和與遠端物件通訊所需的所有相關資訊。The class holds all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object. 這個類別是可序列化的表示法，傳輸到遠端位置使用的通道，它會解除封裝的物件 (請參閱) 而且可用來建立遠端物件的本機 proxy。This class is a serializable representation of an object that is transmitted to a remote location using a channel, where it is unmarshaled (see ) and can be used to create a local proxy of the remoted object. > [!NOTE] > 傳址方式封送處理物件 (Mbr) 不永遠位於記憶體中。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反地，除非類型覆寫若要控制它自己的存留期原則，每個 MBR 具有有限的存留期之前的.NET Framework 遠端處理系統開始刪除它，並回收記憶體的程序。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 存留期租用期](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx).
